ARABIC: كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا كُلِّهَا فَأَخَذْنَٰهُمْ أَخْذَ عَزِيزٍ مُّقْتَدِرٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They dismissed every one of Our Signs and so We seized them with the seizing of One who is Almighty, Ail-Powerful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They rejected each one of Our signs. So We seized them with the grip of one mighty and powerful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: but they gave the lie to Our Signs, to all of them. Thereupon We seized them with the seizing of the Most Mighty, the Most Powerful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: but they rejected all Our miracles. So We seized them in the way that a Majestic and All-powerful One would.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They denied all Our signs, We therefore seized them – the seizure of the Most Honourable, the All Powerful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (They) denied all Our signs, so We seized them with a punishment of the Almighty, All-Capable.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They rejected all Our communications, so We overtook them after the manner of a Mighty, Powerful One.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They cried lies to Our signs, all of them, so We seized them with the seizing of One mighty, omnipotent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Who denied Our revelations, every one. Therefore We grasped them with the grasp of the Mighty, the Powerful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They, too, rejected all Our signs. So We seized them with the seizure of One Mighty, Omnipotent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They belied Our signs everyone thereof; whereof We laid hold of them with the grip of our Mighty, Powerful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: who denied all of Our signs. So We seized them with the seizing of One [who is] all-mighty, Omnipotent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: The (people) rejected all Our Signs; but We seized them with such Penalty (as comes) from One Exalted in Power, able to carry out His Will.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (They) belied all Our Signs, so We seized them with a Seizure of the All-Mighty, All-Capable to carry out what he Will (Omnipotent).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: but they belied all Our signs so We seized them with the seizing of the Mighty, Powerful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They rejected Our signs, all of them, so We seized them—the seizure of an Almighty Omnipotent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They denied Our signs, all of them, so We seized them with a seizure of one Exalted in Might and Perfect in Ability.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [54:42] Rather: They denied Our signs, all, nine, of them, which were given to Moses. So We seized them, by way of chastisement, with the seizing of One [Who is] Mighty, Strong, Omnipotent, Powerful, Whom nothing can thwart.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Who denied Our revelations, every one) of the nine signs. (Therefore We grasped them with the grasp of the Mighty) by means of punishment, (the Powerful) to inflict punishment.
